root.item:
FB - command+j send return (enter)FB - felipebueno.return
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::RETURN

FB - command+h to delete backwardFB - felipebueno.backspace
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::DELETE

FB - command+d to delete forwardFB - felipebueno.delete
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::D, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::DELETE, ModifierFlag::FN

FB - command+option_l+h delete whole wordFB - felipebueno.fds
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::DELETE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
FB - Disable DeleteFB - felipebueno.drop_delete __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DELETE, KeyCode::VK_NONE

FB - Swap Command_L with Control_L (Terminal)FB - felipebueno.app_term_commandL2controlL TERMINAL __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CONTROL_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L
FB - Swap Command_L with Control_L (Emacs)FB - felipebueno.app_emacs_commandL2controlL EMACS __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CONTROL_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L

FB - Force change C-i to TabFB -
FB - In Emacs, TerminalFB - felipebueno.emacsmode_force_controlI_term EMACS, TERMINAL __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::I, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::TAB
FB - In EclipseFB - felipebueno.emacsmode_force_controlI_eclipse ECLIPSE __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::I, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::TAB
